casebody.data:
Antonio Chaparro NIEVES a/k/a Anthony Chaparro, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
OFFICE OF the PUBLIC DEFENDER; Peter S. Adolf, Esq.; et al., Defendants-Movants. M-1287 September Term 2017
081104 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 1, 2018

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal is granted and the matter is summarily remanded to the Superior Court, Appellate Division to consider on the merits.
